phrases: I cannot forgive anyone who toys with a girl's precious time!
Even the cuckoo in the cuckoo clock is mad!
In the name of the moon, Sailor Moon will punish you.
I am sorry I am not straightforward, I can say it in my dreams
My thoughts are about to short circuit, I want to see you right now
Moonlight that makes me want to cry, midnight that keeps me from calling
Because I am so innocent, what should I do?
Guided by the light of the moon
We will meet again and again
I count the sparkle of constellations to foretell the future of my love
We were born in the same land, miracle romance
I believe in it, miracle romance
I am Usagi Tsukino, 14 years old.
I am clumsier than others and a bit of a crybaby.
One day, a strange black cat, Luna, appeared
and gave me a peculiar transforming brooch and made me a sailor warrior.
But, she wants me to fight against bad guys.
Oh well, I guess everything will be okay.
Watch Out For the Rushing Clocks
Did you say the second warrior showed up?
Then all the more reason to hurry and collect energy for our ruler!
Queen Beryl, I have a great idea.
Humans produce more energy when they are psychologically stressed.
For example, when they are pressed for time.
So, if we steal their time and because them to rush about,
we can efficiently collect their increased energy.
Harajuku Station Entrance I guess you have never come to places like this before.
I would read about them in books, but that was all.
You need to go out more!
You do not need to apologize.
You do not need to apologize.
let us have as much fun as we can window-shopping!
Let us go over here next!
Let us go over here next!
Hey, did you find anything interesting?
Ami, what kind of books do you read?
Shall we show each other what we got?
Clock Look Big Spring Bargain Week
Clock Look Big Spring Bargain Week
Oh, wow, that is so cheap!
I already have the watch I got from my mother, so I am okay.
You should act more your age!
It is free if we are just going to look.
So, it would be a waste if we do not!
Please feel free to look around.
Nope, looks like this place is special.
Wow, it looks just like Luna!
Wow, it looks just like Luna!
Maybe I will buy this one.
After all, I am always late for school.
It may be cheap, but my wallet still cannot take it!
And if I am late to school one more time, I will break my own record!
Usagi, if you want, I will come get you every morning.
I got you something nice today.
So, what did you get for me?
I went shopping with Naru and Umino's mothers today.
The clock store we stopped by was having an incredible sale.
I just remembered that you are always late for school.
Looks like God did not abandon me after all...
Usagi, which part of this clock looks like me?
I am better looking than that clock!
Since Ami will be here tomorrow, I do not need to worry about being late.
First of all, that cat looks so sneaky.
Do I look as sneaky as that cat?
It is only 7 of the clock.
Her brother, Shingo, left home before 7.
Now, I have to vacuum the rooms and do the laundry.
It is almost time for dinner!
I will go out there and get everybody!
I cannot stay here like this anymore!
You can study by yourself today!
It is already 8, and most students have not even shown up yet.
Anyway, I have four dates today.
So, I cannot stay here like this.
Once I finish eating my lunch, I have nothing left to do.
In old days, they used to say, Fall in love, life is short!
Anyway, we should not waste our time like this!
Why are the shops opening so early?
I am glad I found you.
I do not know what is going on, but Usagi left home early today.
Why are you in such a hurry?
I think something is wrong with this clock.
Anyway, let us open this and see...
To put it simply, it is a compact supercomputer.
It is really useful for analyzing and calculating things.
Are you sure I can have this?
Usagi would never figure out how to use it,
but I know you will be able to use it easily!
Anyway, can you hurry and check the clock?
The weird way people are acting
must have something to do with that Clock Look.
I need to rush to the hospital!
Now, I have no choice, I am going to run to Paris!
Stupid humans, rushing to your deaths.
The more you hurry, the more energy you produce.
Once I collect all the energy created by your impatience,
our great ruler is certain to be very satisfied.
All the energy collected by my clocks will be gathered
in this gigantic clock no matter where they are.
You certainly know how to manipulate time, Ramua.
Your magical power really paralyzed their sense of time.
Thank you for your kind words.
Now, I leave everything to you.
There is a possibility that they will appear
Oh, it is slow, it is so slow!
Why is this bus so darn slow?!
Oh, it is slow, it is so slow!
Why is this bus so darn slow?!
You are not the only one getting impatient!
If I cannot go left, I will go to the right!
I have been doing this for ten years!
I am a genius, out of my way!
Unfortunately, I have decided that this bus will run express today!
So, do not expect me to stop until the last stop!
So, do not expect me to stop until the last stop!
Nobody at school answered the phone.
I am not comfortable doing this all by ourselves.
I guess we have no choice but to find Usagi.
We are going to be late!
We are going to be late!
You should know I am too busy for this!
So, this is the monster's hideout!
So, this is the monster's hideout!
So, this is the monster's hideout!
Clock Look Expensive watches * Jewelry Wait, Usagi!
If you act like this, they will notice us!
How can you stay so calm?!
You think that clock store is behind this, right?
Then, we should just charge in already!
Usagi, you are completely under the spell of the monster.
I have so many things to do today!
Go home early, eat snacks and finish the rest of my game.
Oh, I did not know it is so late already!
I will figure out a way to get in.
We could try to get in from the back,
but the enemy could already be waiting for us.
It does not matter which way we go, if it is going to be a trap anyway!
Now, Ami, let us transform quickly.
Thinking is not going to get us anywhere.
I know they say, Nothing ventured, nothing gained.
I am the sailor warrior of love and justice, Sailor Moon!
We are here to fight you!
I never expected you to show up so early.
I cannot forgive anyone who toys with a girl's precious time!
Even the cuckoo in the cuckoo clock is mad!
In the name of the moon, I will punish you!
I will show you that this is where you are going to die!
Now, come and get me, Sailor Moon!
Be careful, Sailor Moon, Sailor Mercury!
The monster has probably set a trap somewhere.
It is cheap not to show yourself!
You do not have to tell me that, I will be right there!
It is dangerous to just walk around blindly.
Sailor Moon, if you just walk around without thinking, we will get lost!
Because I have got you, Mercury!
Luna gave it to me just a while ago.
You are the one that is cheating here!
It seems like time here can go faster or slower.
Then, there could be a room where we become grannies?
I am the sailor warrior, Sailor Moon.
I am the sailor warrior, Sailor Moon.
It seems like this maze is set up in a certain way...
There is a 78 probability she is this way.
You finally found where I am.
You are the one who should get ready!
Finally, it is starting to work.
Your energy has been sucked away by my clock.
So, enjoy watching Sailor Moon suffer.
Are you all right, Sailor Moon?
This time, I am really exhausted.
I do not want to get stressed out anymore!
I do not want to get stressed out anymore!
A cake shop is doing a speed eating contest!
I do not think her personality will ever change!
I do not think her personality will ever change!
In my dream, you and I were together
When we were friends, it did not bother us
And we casually talked to each other
But there was a moment when I noticed only you
I want to become prettier right here and now
Something changes when you fall in love
I close my eyes and check to make sure
I want to convey the thrill I felt when we held each other
